roleset.name: out of control, crazy

example.name: slangified- unbelievable, crazy
example.text: It is wild to me how such an effective , strong , woman -- the closest advisor to the most powerful person in the world -- has garnered no more support , no accolades from women and blacks -- two groups who are always trying to find successful sisters or positive stories of black achievement .
example.arg: how such an effective , strong , woman -- the closest advisor to the most powerful person in the world -- has garnered no more support , no accolades from women and blacks -- two groups who are always trying to find successful sisters or positive stories of black achievement

example.name: with CAU
example.text: The children were wild with excitement

roleset.note: WILD-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. (from wild.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The raspberries were wild and hand picked but the blackberries were purchased on sale.

example.name: arg1
example.text: This horse was wild in December and now she is under saddle and enjoying life on the trails and outside her paddock.

roleset.name: wild about: really really like

example.name: both args
example.text: I am wild about [hosting events in] small, intimate dining rooms in restaurants.
example.arg: about [hosting events in] small, intimate dining rooms in restaurants.

roleset.note: WILD-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from wild.03-j)
